PackList.title: Slasher Glow
positive_prompts:
ABSOLUTE IDENTITY LOCK (MANDATORY): Use the attached photo as the ONLY facial reference. Do NOT change the face in any way. The facial structure, proportions, bone shape, jawline, cheeks, chin, nose, lips, eyes, eyelids, eyebrows, expression, and facial symmetry must remain exactly identical to the original photo. No reinterpretation, no enhancement, no beautification, no reshaping.

NO FRECKLES (MANDATORY): Do not add freckles or speckles to the skin.

SKIN TEXTURE (CRITICAL): Keep skin neat and clean but fully realistic and photographic — visible fine pores, natural micro skin grain, subtle tonal variation. No airbrushing, no plastic smoothing, no beauty filters.

LIPS & MICRO-DETAIL (CRITICAL): Preserve the original lip shape exactly (size, edges, cupid's bow, vermilion border) and keep realistic lip lines and subtle specular highlights.

HAIR PRESERVATION (STRICT): Preserve the original hairstyle exactly — same hairline, length, volume, texture, direction, density, and hair color. No changes to haircut, parting, or hair shape.

Cinematic close-up portrait looking directly into the camera with a soft, neutral expression. Dramatic "slasher" lighting style creates a dark sharp vertical shadow covering the right side of face (viewer's left), while the other side is bathed in warm, soft golden hour sunlight. Hand partially raised to face, with fingers slightly curled and nails painted in metallic silver chrome polish. Hyper-realistic skin texture showing subtle pores and soft dewy glow. Wearing simple mauve-pink t-shirt and delicate gold layered necklaces. Dark, moody background, 8k resolution, shot on 85mm lens, high contrast, photorealistic.
